00028 /* Define to prevent recursive inclusion -------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00029 #ifndef __HT32_CM0PLUS_MISC_H
00030 #define __HT32_CM0PLUS_MISC_H
00031 
00032 #ifdef __cplusplus
00033  extern "C" {
00034 #endif
00035 
00036 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 #include "ht32.h"
00038 
00039 /** @addtogroup HT32_Peripheral_Driver
00040   * @{
00041   */
00042 
00043 /** @addtogroup MISC
00044   * @{
00045   */
00046 
00047 
00048 /* Exported constants --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup MISC_Exported_Constants MISC exported constants
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 
00053 /* Vector Table Base                                                                                        */
00054 #define NVIC_VECTTABLE_RAM                          ((u32)0x20000000)
00055 #define NVIC_VECTTABLE_FLASH                        ((u32)0x00000000)
00056 
00057 #define IS_NVIC_VECTTABLE(VECTTABLE)                ((VECTTABLE == NVIC_VECTTABLE_RAM) || \
00058                                                      (VECTTABLE == NVIC_VECTTABLE_FLASH))
00059 
00060 #define IS_NVIC_OFFSET(OFFSET)                      (OFFSET < 0x0001FFFF)
00061 
00062 /* System Low Power                                                                                         */
00063 #define NVIC_LOWPOWER_SEVONPEND                     ((u8)0x10)
00064 #define NVIC_LOWPOWER_SLEEPDEEP                     ((u8)0x04)
00065 #define NVIC_LOWPOWER_SLEEPONEXIT                   ((u8)0x02)
00066 
00067 #define IS_NVIC_LOWPOWER(LOWPOWER)                  ((LOWPOWER == NVIC_LOWPOWER_SEVONPEND) || \
00068                                                      (LOWPOWER == NVIC_LOWPOWER_SLEEPDEEP) || \
00069                                                      (LOWPOWER == NVIC_LOWPOWER_SLEEPONEXIT))
00070 
00071 /* System Handler                                                                                           */
00072 #define SYSTEMHANDLER_NMI                           ((u32)0x80000000)
00073 #define SYSTEMHANDLER_PSV                           ((u32)0x10000000)
00074 #define SYSTEMHANDLER_SYSTICK                       ((u32)0x04000000)
00075 #define SYSTEMHANDLER_ALL                           ((u32)0x94000000)
00076 
00077 #define IS_NVIC_SYSTEMHANDLER(HANDLER)              ((HANDLER == SYSTEMHANDLER_NMI)     || \
00078                                                      (HANDLER == SYSTEMHANDLER_PSV)     || \
00079                                                      (HANDLER == SYSTEMHANDLER_SYSTICK) ||\
00080                                                      (HANDLER == SYSTEMHANDLER_ALL))
00081 
00082 /* SysTick clock source                                                                                     */
00083 #define SYSTICK_SRC_STCLK                           ((u32)0xFFFFFFFB)
00084 #define SYSTICK_SRC_FCLK                            ((u32)0x00000004)
00085 
00086 #define IS_SYSTICK_CLOCK_SOURCE(SOURCE)             ((SOURCE == SYSTICK_SRC_STCLK) || \
00087                                                      (SOURCE == SYSTICK_SRC_FCLK) )
00088 
00089 /* SysTick counter state                                                                                    */
00090 #define SYSTICK_COUNTER_DISABLE                     ((u32)0xFFFFFFFE)
00091 #define SYSTICK_COUNTER_ENABLE                      ((u32)0x00000001)
00092 #define SYSTICK_COUNTER_CLEAR                       ((u32)0x00000000)
00093 
00094 #define IS_SYSTICK_COUNTER(COUNTER)                 ((COUNTER == SYSTICK_COUNTER_DISABLE) || \
00095                                                      (COUNTER == SYSTICK_COUNTER_ENABLE)  || \
00096                                                      (COUNTER == SYSTICK_COUNTER_CLEAR))
00097 
00098 #define IS_SYSTICK_RELOAD(RELOAD)                   ((RELOAD  > 0) && (RELOAD <= 0xFFFFFF))
00099 /**
00100   * @}
00101   */
00102 
00103 /* Exported functions --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00104 /** @defgroup MISC_Exported_Functions MISC exported functions
00105   * @{
00106   */
00107 void NVIC_SetVectorTable(u32 NVIC_VectTable, u32 NVIC_Offset);
00108 void NVIC_LowPowerConfig(u8 NVIC_LowPowerMode, ControlStatus NewState);
00109 void NVIC_SetPendingSystemHandler(u32 SystemHandler);
00110 void SYSTICK_ClockSourceConfig(u32 SysTick_ClockSource);
00111 void SYSTICK_CounterCmd(u32 SysTick_Counter);
00112 void SYSTICK_IntConfig(ControlStatus NewState);
00113 void SYSTICK_SetReloadValue(u32 SysTick_Reload);
00114 u32 RBIT(u32 in);
00115 /**
00116   * @}
00117   */
00118
